entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @DavidBrodyCBN @PressSec @realDonaldTrump @POTUS He never said that Mexico was going to pay for the wall, or that the coronavirus was going to disappear like a miracle, that China is paying for the tariffs or that Windmills cause cancer. He is like George Washington and cannot tell a lie.
